message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Given its value to us, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. We believe this is a fantastic opportunity for both of us, as it allows you to acquire a high-quality product at a price that's significantly lower than the market value, while ensuring a fair return on our investment. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
